cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.HC. 

The paper discusses the use of contextual bandit algorithms in recommender systems, which is a common topic in the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of verbal feedback from users, which falls under the category of natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the optimization of the learning process, which is relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
